home.title: Online forms to get insights quickly
home.subtitle: Easily create forms and surveys to gather data and gain insights from anywhere.

create.title: Create Surveys
create.desc: Easily design surveys tailored to your business needs. Define the right questions to gather meaningful insights.

collect.title: Collect Responses
collect.desc: Share your surveys with companies, teams, or customers and gather responses in real time, from any device.

analyse.title: Analyse with Visuals
analyse.desc: Transform raw data into clear charts and graphs, making trends and patterns easy to understand.

ai.title: Get AI-powered Insights
ai.desc: Use AI to interpret survey results and provide actionable recommendations for your company's next steps.

ai.title: AI-Powered Insights
ai.desc: Transform survey responses into actionable recommendations with artificial intelligence.

data.title: Data Visualisation
data.desc: Understand trends at a glance with clear charts, graphs, and dashboards.

surveys.title: Smart Surveys
surveys.desc: Easily design and customise surveys tailored to your company's needs.

realtime.title: Real-Time Analytics
realtime.desc: Collect responses instantly and make decisions based on fresh, real-time data.

starter.name: Starter
starter.desc: For trying out surveys and basic reporting.

pro.name: Pro
pro.desc: Advanced analytics and AI insights for growing teams.

business.name: Business
business.desc: For organisations that need scale, security and SLA.

t1.quote: I just wanted to say that I'm very happy with my purchase so far. The documentation is outstanding - clear and detailed.
t1.author: Josh Grazioso

t2.quote: The platform helped us collect insights faster than ever. Our team can now make decisions in real time.
t2.author: Sophie Lee

t3.quote: AI-powered recommendations are a game changer. It feels like having an analyst 24/7.
t3.author: Daniel Ruiz

t4.quote: The survey builder is super intuitive. I created my first form in minutes and had responses the same day.
t4.author: Emily Carter

t5.quote: We were able to increase customer satisfaction by quickly understanding their needs through visualised data.
t5.author: Michael Tan

t6.quote: Our leadership team now makes decisions confidently thanks to the AI insights. It really accelerated our growth.
t6.author: Lucía Fernández

contact.title: Let's Stay Connected
contact.subtitle: Reach out to us directly or follow our journey on your favourite platforms.

brand.name: Inquiro
brand.description: We help organisations turn feedback into action. Inquiro lets you design and launch surveys, collect responses in real time, visualise results with clear dashboards, and generate AI-powered recommendations—so teams can make confident, data-driven decisions faster.
